data.actual_result: Occasionally a default Discord avatar with flash in the place of the group dm icon.
data.expected_result: You are worthlessly spamming a joined button.
data.short_description: Spam clicking Joined button on group DM invite causes group DM avatar to flash to a normal discord one.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a group dm. - Create a group dm invite. - Post it. - Spam click the joined button.
